Posts.Content: Thanks ruby rose. Yes she has been in contact with the cancer centre helpline. I think she is finally getting some sleep now so I won’t bother her but we maybe need to give them a call in the morning to discuss.  Xx
Posts.Title: Mum has started chemo...

Posts.Content: Hi My mum has had her first of six rounds of FEC [switching to FECD for last three].   She is day 4 after first dose. Was doing really well apart from not sleeping (think this was more down to steroids) but today really tired and indigestion.  Wondering should we expect this to worsen. Is there anyway of adjusting the steroids to help her sleep next time?  And what can I do to help? Thanks X
Posts.Title: Mum has started chemo...

Posts.Content: I guess I’m just feeling pretty helpless and want to do what I can to help her through this.  Advice from anyone who has been there would be really appreciated thank you X
Posts.Title: Mum has started chemo...

Posts.Content: Thank you. Must ensure she’s drinking plenty. Will keep an eye on that thanks
